1.name: E
1.master_equations:
dv/dt=(current + I_app)/Cm : volt
Cm = 1*uF : farad
I_app = 0*uA : amp

raw_eqns.neuron_eqns:
g_Na = 120*msiemens : siemens
E_Na = 50*mV : volt
v_shift_Na = -65*mV : volt
alpha_m_Na = (2.5-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)/(exp(2.5-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)-1)/ms : Hz
beta_m_Na = 4*exp(-(v-v_shift_Na)/mV/18)/ms : Hz
alpha_h_Na = .07*exp(-(v-v_shift_Na)/mV/20)/ms : Hz
beta_h_Na = 1./(exp(3-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)+1)/ms : Hz
I_Na = -g_Na*m_Na**3*h_Na*(v-E_Na) : amp
# ODEs and ICs
dm_Na/dt = alpha_m_Na*(1-m_Na)-beta_m_Na*m_Na : 1
dh_Na/dt = alpha_h_Na*(1-h_Na)-beta_h_Na*h_Na : 1

converted_eqns.neuron_eqns:
v_shift_Na = -65*mV : volt
g_Na = 120*msiemens : siemens
alpha_h_Na = .07*exp(-(v-v_shift_Na)/mV/20)/ms : hertz
beta_m_Na = 4*exp(-(v-v_shift_Na)/mV/18)/ms : hertz
E_Na = 50*mV : volt
alpha_m_Na = (2.5-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)/(exp(2.5-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)-1)/ms : hertz
beta_h_Na = 1./(exp(3-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)+1)/ms : hertz
I_Na = -g_Na*m_Na**3*h_Na*(v-E_Na) : amp
dm_Na/dt = alpha_m_Na*(1-m_Na)-beta_m_Na*m_Na : 1
dh_Na/dt = alpha_h_Na*(1-h_Na)-beta_h_Na*h_Na : 1

raw_eqns.neuron_eqns:
# Parameters
g_K = 36*msiemens : siemens
E_K = -77*mV : volt
v_shift_K = -65*mV : volt
# Functions
alpha_n_K = (.1-.01*(v-v_shift_K)/mV)/(exp(1-.1*(v-v_shift_K)/mV)-1)/ms : Hz
beta_n_K = .125*exp(-(v-v_shift_K)/mV/80)/ms : Hz
I_K = -g_K*n_K**4.*(v-E_K) : amp
# ODEs and ICs
dn_K/dt = alpha_n_K*(1-n_K)-beta_n_K*n_K : 1

converted_eqns.neuron_eqns:
g_K = 36*msiemens : siemens
v_shift_K = -65*mV : volt
E_K = -77*mV : volt
beta_n_K = .125*exp(-(v-v_shift_K)/mV/80)/ms : hertz
alpha_n_K = (.1-.01*(v-v_shift_K)/mV)/(exp(1-.1*(v-v_shift_K)/mV)-1)/ms : hertz
I_K = -g_K*n_K**4.*(v-E_K) : amp
dn_K/dt = alpha_n_K*(1-n_K)-beta_n_K*n_K : 1

raw_eqns.neuron_eqns:
# Parameters
g_T = 2*msiemens : siemens
v_shift_T = -2*mV : volt
phi_h_T = 3.73 : 1
# Functions
E_T = 1000.*((8.31441*309.15)/(2.*96846))*log(2./CaBuffer)*mV : volt
m_inf_T  = 1./(1+exp((-((v-v_shift_T)/mV+57))/6.2)) : 1
h_inf_T  = 1./(1+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+81)/4)) : 1
tau_h_T  = (30.8+(211.4+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+113.2)/5))/(1+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+84)/3.2)))/phi_h_T*ms : second
I_T = -g_T*m_inf_T**2*h_T*(v-E_T) : amp
# ODEs and ICs
dh_T/dt = (h_inf_T-h_T)/tau_h_T : 1

converted_eqns.neuron_eqns:
v_shift_T = -2*mV : volt
E_T = 1000.*((8.31441*309.15)/(2.*96846))*log(2./CaBuffer)*mV : volt
h_inf_T = 1./(1+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+81)/4)) : 1
m_inf_T = 1./(1+exp((-((v-v_shift_T)/mV+57))/6.2)) : 1
g_T = 2*msiemens : siemens
phi_h_T = 3.73 : 1
I_T = -g_T*m_inf_T**2*h_T*(v-E_T) : amp
tau_h_T = (30.8+(211.4+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+113.2)/5))/(1+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+84)/3.2)))/phi_h_T*ms : second
dh_T/dt = (h_inf_T-h_T)/tau_h_T : 1

1.full_neuron_eqns:
dv/dt=(I_Na+I_K+I_T + I_app)/Cm : volt
Cm = 1*uF : farad
I_app = 0*uA : amp

v_shift_Na = -65*mV : volt
g_Na = 120*msiemens : siemens
alpha_h_Na = .07*exp(-(v-v_shift_Na)/mV/20)/ms : hertz
beta_m_Na = 4*exp(-(v-v_shift_Na)/mV/18)/ms : hertz
E_Na = 50*mV : volt
alpha_m_Na = (2.5-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)/(exp(2.5-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)-1)/ms : hertz
beta_h_Na = 1./(exp(3-.1*(v-v_shift_Na)/mV)+1)/ms : hertz
I_Na = -g_Na*m_Na**3*h_Na*(v-E_Na) : amp
dm_Na/dt = alpha_m_Na*(1-m_Na)-beta_m_Na*m_Na : 1
dh_Na/dt = alpha_h_Na*(1-h_Na)-beta_h_Na*h_Na : 1
g_K = 36*msiemens : siemens
v_shift_K = -65*mV : volt
E_K = -77*mV : volt
beta_n_K = .125*exp(-(v-v_shift_K)/mV/80)/ms : hertz
alpha_n_K = (.1-.01*(v-v_shift_K)/mV)/(exp(1-.1*(v-v_shift_K)/mV)-1)/ms : hertz
I_K = -g_K*n_K**4.*(v-E_K) : amp
dn_K/dt = alpha_n_K*(1-n_K)-beta_n_K*n_K : 1
v_shift_T = -2*mV : volt
E_T = 1000.*((8.31441*309.15)/(2.*96846))*log(2./CaBuffer)*mV : volt
h_inf_T = 1./(1+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+81)/4)) : 1
m_inf_T = 1./(1+exp((-((v-v_shift_T)/mV+57))/6.2)) : 1
g_T = 2*msiemens : siemens
phi_h_T = 3.73 : 1
I_T = -g_T*m_inf_T**2*h_T*(v-E_T) : amp
tau_h_T = (30.8+(211.4+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+113.2)/5))/(1+exp(((v-v_shift_T)/mV+84)/3.2)))/phi_h_T*ms : second
dh_T/dt = (h_inf_T-h_T)/tau_h_T : 1
dCaBuffer/dt = clip(((-10.*I_T)/uA/(2.*96489)), 0, 5)/ms + (0.00024/ms-CaBuffer/ms)/5 : 1
